eventDecorators.name: BidAccepted
eventDecorators.description: A processed deposit event. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

eventDecorators.name: BidCancelled
eventDecorators.description: A processed deposit event. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

eventDecorators.name: BidCreated
eventDecorators.description: A processed deposit event. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

eventDecorators.name: OrderCancelled
eventDecorators.description: A processed deposit event. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

eventDecorators.name: OrderCreated
eventDecorators.description: A processed deposit event. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

eventDecorators.name: OrderSuccessful
eventDecorators.description: A processed deposit event. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

eventDecorators.name: OrderUpdated
eventDecorators.description: A processed deposit event. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: A processed deposit event. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

parameterDecorators.name: previousOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the previous owner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new owner.

eventDecorators.name: Paused
eventDecorators.description: A processed deposit event. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

eventDecorators.name: Unpaused
eventDecorators.description: A processed deposit event. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

functionDecorators.name: acceptBid
functionDecorators.description: Executes the sale for a published NFT by accepting a current bid.

parameterDecorators.name: _priceInWei
parameterDecorators.description: - Bid price in wei in acceptedTokens currency.

functionDecorators.name: cancelBid
functionDecorators.description: Cancel an already published bid can only be canceled by seller or the contract owner.

functionDecorators.name: cancelOrder
functionDecorators.description: Cancel an already published order can only be canceled by seller or the contract owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _priceInWei
parameterDecorators.description: - Price in Wei for the supported coin.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: safeExecuteOrder
functionDecorators.description: Executes the sale for a published NFT and checks for the asset fingerprint.

functionDecorators.name: safePlaceBid
functionDecorators.description: Places a bid for a published NFT and checks for the asset fingerprint.

functionDecorators.name: setPaused
functionDecorators.description: Sets the paused failsafe. Can only be called by owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updateOrder
functionDecorators.description: Update an already published order can only be updated by seller.
